node.detail_zh: 患者為一名運動員，曾與 #172 患者的空手道運動員李振豪於 2 月 19 日至 3 月 14 日一同到法國及奧地利訓練空手道， 3 月 19 日在泰國轉機返港。同行另有 4 人，其中 1 人亦需要入院，不過初步檢測呈陰性反應。
node.detail_en: The patient is an athlete. She went to France and Austria for Karate practice together with #172 between Feb 19 and Mar 14. They returned to Hong Kong by transiting through Thailand on Mar 19. There were four other people who went on the same trip, one of whom has been admitted to the hospital and preliminarily tested negative for COVID-19.

groups.description_zh: 香港空手道團 3 名運動員及教練曾到法國集訓，回港後先後確診。
groups.description_en: 3 karate athletes and 1 coach trained in France, and were confirmed positive to coronavirus upon return to Hong Kong.

node.location_en: Athlete's Hostel in Hong Kong Sports Institutes

node.remarks_zh: 與個案 #172 有關，3 月 19 日出現發燒症狀
node.remarks_en: Epilinked to case 172, developed fever since Mar 19
